content.description:
Can go left to right or right to left. right to left is more difficult. 

  The rock is amazing and the climbing is very smooth. You can also do a straight up variation on the left side of the wall. 

  Great for a warm up or cool down, it's just fun.
content.location: From the Monkey Hut Boulder walk up hill whatever way you can untill you reach the top of the hill. the warm up wall is located a few hundred feet to the right. If you walk around the top of the hill you should find it shortly.

content.description:
Sit start on holds in the thin crack and work up to a sharp pocket. make a large move to a great hold on the lip and mantle into the cavity. Classic mantel!  

  Can be very fun or very frustrating...
content.location:
Located on the right side of the Monkey Hut boulder, the first large boulder you will get to. 

  there is an obvious cutout into which you will mantle. Have fun!

content.description: Start in the large left facing crack in the middle of the boulder and work right to the same mantle as monkey hut.
Usually sunny, but can remain wet for a couple days after a rain.
